Let me know if you have further Twilio questions.
Regards, Stacy David

Hello,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.

Let me know if the above works for you. Or if you have further Twilio questions.
Regards, Stacy

Since you are using a Trail account, you will need to pre-verify the phone numbers you will be sending SMS messages. Here is he link to verify phone numbers: https://www.twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/verified
This following link includes steps that include verifying a phone number. Since you are using a Twilio Trial Account, you will need to pre-verify phone number you are sending to. https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/tutorials/how-to-use-your-free-trial-account
Article, How does Twilio's Free Trial work? https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223136107-How-does-Twilio-s-Free-Trial-work-
If you upgrade your account, you can exchange SMS messages with any phone number. Article, Upgrading to a paid Twilio Account https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223183208-Upgrading-to-a-paid-Twilio-Account
Article, What's the Difference Between a Verified Phone Number and a Twilio Phone Number? https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223135427-What-s-the-Difference-Between-a-Verified-Phone-Number-and-a-Twilio-Phone-Number-

Hello,
I wanted to check back with you to see how you are coming along. Please let me know if I can be of further assistance.
Regards, Stacy David

Here is a link to your SDKs: https://www.twilio.com/docs/video Android Setup iOS Setup JavaScript Setup Web: https://github.com/twilio/video-quickstart-js iOS Swift: https://github.com/twilio/video-quickstart-swift Android: https://github.com/twilio/video-quickstart-android
Once you start working with Video, the tutorials will be useful: https://www.twilio.com/docs/video/tutorials Once you start working with Video, the tutorials will be useful: https://www.twilio.com/docs/video/tutorials

Chat
Web, has instructions and PHP application download: https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/javascript/quickstart iOS quickstart: https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/ios/quickstart Android quickstart: https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/android/quickstart
Web: I packaged a straight forward basic Twilio Chat application with instructions: https://github.com/tigerfarm/owlchat Includes Twilio Console configurations and a Twilio Function to generate tokens.

Voice
Twilio Programmable Voice overview:https://www.twilio.com/voice
Voice SDKs: https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/voip-sdk iOS Swift, Getting started: https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/voip-sdk/ios/get-started *** https://github.com/twilio/voice-quickstart-swift Android, Getting started: https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/voip-sdk/get-started *** https://github.com/twilio/voice-quickstart-android
For managing calls between callers and agents, we have TaskRouter. Twilio TaskRouter overview: https://www.twilio.com/taskrouter

Hello,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.
As I am a technical support engineer, below, I have included technical information and links to our pricing pages.
I feel you maybe better served talking to our Sales team. I will forward you to them. If you do have technical, please feel free to reply to this message, or to open another ticket for your tech questions.

To get started: + Open a Twilio account: https://twilio.com/console. + You can use a Trial account for free to get started, or upgrade:
Steps to get started, How to Work with your Free Twilio Trial Account: https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/tutorials/how-to-use-your-free-trial-account
If you upgrade your account, you can exchange SMS messages with any phone number. Article, Upgrading to a paid Twilio Account https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223183208-Upgrading-to-a-paid-Twilio-Account
To upgrade, you will enter credit card information and add a balance of $20. Usage will be deducted. + You will need to buy a Twilio phone number to send and receive SMS messages.https://www.twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/search
Cost to send to a US phone number: $ 0.0075 / message. https://www.twilio.com/sms/pricing/
For sending text messages, we have Twilio Programmable Messaging. Overview: https://www.twilio.com/sms Documentation to get you started: https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms Documentation and sample programs to send SMS: https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/send-messages List incoming messages (logs): https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message Tutorials: https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/tutorials Tutorial on receiving SMS replies using a webhook https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/tutorials/how-to-receive-and-reply
Notify for sending the same message to multiple recipients: https://www.twilio.com/notify

Hello,
Thank you for contacting Twilio Support.
As I am a technical support engineer, below, I have included technical information and links to our pricing pages. Let me know if you would like to be transferred to our Sales team for more pricing information.

Here are the steps I used to get, and use, the Twilio PHP helper library on my website:
+ In the directory where you have your Twilio PHP program, add the Twilio PHP Helper Library. Documentation link: https://www.twilio.com/docs/libraries/php + Click the download link: https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/archive/master.zip Download the zip file into your PHP program's directory and unzip it.
+ In your PHP program, use the correct directory name to make the unzipped file: require __DIR__ . '/twilio-php-master/Twilio/autoload.php';
+ Here is how to confirm your PHP program directory, this command should work: $ cat twilio-php-master/Twilio/autoload.php

Here is the Twilio Console link to buy one: https://www.twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/search
Reference links, documentation: https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers
Twilio international phone number availability and their capabilities: https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223183068-Twilio-international-phone-number-availability-and-their-capabilities

Since you have a Twilio Trial account, you will need to pre-verify the phone numbers before you send messages to the phone number. Also, if receive messages from a non-verified phone number, you will get a debug message. Here is the Twilio Console link to verify phone numbers: https://www.twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/verified How to verify phone numbers: https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/tutorials/how-to-use-your-free-trial-account
How does Twilio's Free Trial work? https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223136107-How-does-Twilio-s-Free-Trial-work-
If you upgrade your account, you can exchange SMS messages with any phone number. Article, Upgrading to a paid Twilio Account https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223183208-Upgrading-to-a-paid-Twilio-Account
Article, How to use templates with TwiML Bins:https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/230878368-How-to-use-templates-with-TwiML-Bins

You can query the SMS logs using an API call.
Example cURL command to retrieve messages, filtering on a From and To phone number:
curl -XGET "https://api.twilio.com/2010-04-01/Accounts/your_account_sid/Messages.json?From=16505551111&To=16505552222&PageSize=6" -u 'your_account_sid:your_account_auth_token'
To see sample programs: https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message Available filters: From, To, and DateSent. For filters information, search for, "query string parameters".

For your reference, article, What's the Difference Between User Roles Owner, Administrator, Developer, Billing Manager, and Support? https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223136227-What-s-the-Difference-Between-User-Roles-Owner-Administrator-Developer-Billing-Manager-and-Support-
For your reference, Article, How To Use Twilio Test Credentials with Magic Phone Numbers https://www.twilio.com/blog/2018/04/twilio-test-credentials-magic-numbers.html

Twilio Proxy overview: https://www.twilio.com/proxy "Create conversations between customers and your mobile workers without revealing personal phone numbers." Documentation: https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy
Proxy quickstart, which includes sample PHP programs: https://www.twilio.com/docs/proxy/quickstart This quickstart includes sample implementation steps: Purchase a Twilio phone number Gather your account information Set up your development environment Create a Proxy service Add a phone number to your service Create a session Create participants Send a text message Make a voice call

To disable incoming SMS messages for a Twilio phone number, click on following link: https://www.twilio.com/console/phone-numbers/incoming > Select the Phone Number > Scroll to: Messaging, "A Message Comes In" > Beside the Webhook option, remove the WebHook URL > Click Save.
Support article: https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181648-Is-there-a-way-to-block-incoming-SMS-on-my-Twilio-phone-number-

Manual install of the Twilio helper library following this document: https://www.twilio.com/docs/libraries/python Section: Manual Installation Download the source code (ZIP) for twilio-python, https://github.com/twilio/twilio-python/zipball/master Then install the library by running: python setup.py install
Or, install pip and then use pip to do the install. https://pip.pypa.io/en/latest/installing/ See section, On Windows. Follow the steps.
Once pip is installed, install the Twilio helper library following this document: https://www.twilio.com/docs/libraries/python pip install twilio
Reference link, How do I install Python packages on Windows? https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1449494/how-do-i-install-python-packages-on-windows Starting with Python 2.7, pip is included by default. Simply download your desired package via python -m pip install [package-name]
Call forward setup using Twilio Studio https://www.twilio.com/docs/studio/tutorials/how-to-forward-calls
As a tech support person, I can view account, however, no modify them.
I see in your profile that you are a not a developer.
